language.title: Preferred Language
language.description: The language that Parrot should use for communication.

telemetry.tooltip: This setting is managed by your organization's remote configuration
telemetry.description: Help improve Parrot by sending usage data and error reports. No code, prompts, or personal information are ever sent. See our <telemetryLink>telemetry overview</telemetryLink> and <privacyLink>privacy policy</privacyLink> for more details.

apiProvider.label: API Provider
apiProvider.remoteConfigTooltip: Provider options are managed by your organization's remote config

apiConfig.useDifferentModels: Use different models for Plan and Act modes
apiConfig.useDifferentModelsDescription: Switching between Plan and Act mode will persist the API and model used in the previous mode. This may be helpful e.g. when using a strong reasoning model to architect a plan for a cheaper coding model to act on.

apiKeyField.defaultHelpText: This key is stored locally and only used to make API requests from this extension.
apiKeyField.signupLink: You can get a{{#if providerNameStartsWithVowel}}n{{/if}} {{providerName}} API key by signing up here.

about.title: Cline v{{version}}
about.description: An AI assistant that can use your CLI and Editor. Cline can handle complex software development tasks step-by-step with tools that let him create & edit files, explore large projects, use the browser, and execute terminal commands (after you grant permission).

subagents.title: Subagents
subagents.cliRequired: Subagents require Parrot CLI. Install via:
subagents.authDescription: to authenticate with Parrot or configure API providers.
subagents.description: Allow Parrot to spawn subprocesses to handle focused tasks, like exploring large codebases, keeping your main context clean.

checkpoints.title: Enable Checkpoints
checkpoints.description: Enable the extension to save workspace checkpoints during tasks. Underlying uses git, may not work well for large workspaces.

mcpDisplay.title: MCP Display Mode
mcpDisplay.description: Controls how MCP responses are shown: plain text, rich format with links/images, or rendered markdown.

openaiReasoning.title: OpenAI Reasoning Effort
openaiReasoning.description: Reasoning effort for OpenAI family models (for all OpenAI model providers)

strictPlanMode.title: Enable Strict Plan Mode
strictPlanMode.description: Enforces strict tool usage in plan mode, preventing file edits.

focusChain.title: Enable Focus Chain
focusChain.description: Enable enhanced task progress tracking and automatic focus chain list management during tasks.
focusChain.reminderDescription: Interval (in number of messages, 1-100) to remind Parrot of its focus chain checklist. Lower values provide more frequent reminders.

dictation.title: Enable Dictation
dictation.description: Enable speech-to-text transcription using your Parrot account. Uses the Avalon model from Aqua Voice, billed at $0.0065 credits per minute of processed audio. Up to 5 minutes per message.

autoCompact.title: Enable Auto-Compact
autoCompact.description: Enable the advanced context management system which uses LLM-based compression for next-generation models.

webTools.title: Enable Parrot Web Tools
webTools.description: Enable web search and web fetch tools when using a Parrot provider.

nativeToolCall.title: Enable Native Tool Calling
nativeToolCall.description: Use the model's native tool calling API instead of XML-based tool parsing. This improves performance for supported models.

parallelToolCalling.title: Enable Parallel Tool Calling
parallelToolCalling.description: Allow models to call multiple tools in a single response. Enabled automatically for GPT-5 models.

backgroundEdit.title: Enable Background Edit
backgroundEdit.description: Allow file edits in the background without opening a diff view in the editor.

multiRootWorkspace.title: Enable Multi-Root Workspace
multiRootWorkspace.description: Allow Parrot to work across multiple workspaces.

hooks.title: Enable Hooks
hooks.windowsWarning: Hooks not yet supported on Windows. This feature is currently only available on macOS and Linux.
hooks.description: Allow execution of hooks from the .clinerules/hooks/ directory.

skills.title: Enable Skills
skills.description: Enable reusable, on-demand agent instruction skills from the .cline/skills/ directory.

yoloMode.title: Enable YOLO Mode
yoloMode.remoteConfigTooltip: This setting is managed by your organization's remote config
yoloMode.warning: Experimental & Dangerous: This mode disables safety checks and user confirmations. Parrot will auto-approve all actions without asking. Use with extreme caution.

terminalOutputLimit.title: Terminal output limit
terminalOutputLimit.description: Maximum number of lines to include in terminal output when executing commands. When exceeded, lines will be removed from the middle, saving tokens.

subagentOutputLimit.title: Subagent output limit
subagentOutputLimit.description: Maximum number of lines to include in output from CLI subagents. Truncates middle to save tokens.

useCompactPrompt.title: Use compact prompt
useCompactPrompt.description: A system prompt optimized for smaller context window (e.g. 8k or less).
useCompactPrompt.limitations: Does not support Mcp and Focus Chain
